FuncDef: This command configures the transmission interval for LMP Hello packets. Thedead-intervalspecifies the period after which the IPCC is declared down if no hello packets are received from the LMP peer.

ParaDef.Info: The interval at which LMP hello packets are sent on an IP control channel. Values-1000 to 65535 ms.
The interval after which the IPCC is declared down if no hello packets are received from the LMP peer. Values-3000 to 65535 ms.
